content.question: All of the following developments in the nineteenth century directly contributed to the political situation in Africa as depicted on Map 1 EXCEPT

choices.label: increasing demand for raw materials for factories in Europe
diplomatic and strategic rivalries between European states
the increasing popularity of Social Darwinist ideas in Europe
the global spread of radical Marxist ideologies

content.answer: the global spread of radical Marxist ideologies

topic.text: 5.8: Reactions to the Industrial Economy from 1750 to 1900

skill.text: Skill 5.B: Explain how a historical development or process relates to another historical development or process.
